list_definition.definition: (a) great lack or shortage especially of food

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: Some parts of the world suffer regularly from famine.

list_ex_of_english: During earlier famines, rural households had relied heavily on remittances of male migrants working in distant places.
